ps3.2:6.11: Ekattagataṁ → ekaggataṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | nānattakilesehi → nānattakilese (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ps3.2:14.20: rūpiṁ → rūpaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ → sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps3.2:15.7: indavaṇṇaṁ vā → asuravaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṁ vā (si, sya-all)
ps3.2:26.2: cakkavattī → cakkavatti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | assabandhagopurise → assabandhagobandhapurise (bj); assabandhagopake purise (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
